document.full_text: governor john kasich will sign later on thursday a bill limiting collecting bargaining for about 350,000 public workers and banning them from striking, his spokesman said.
document.title: ohio governor to sign anti-union bill later on thursday
lines_and_colors: governor john kasich will sign later on thursday a bill limiting collecting bargaining for about 350,000 public workers and banning them from striking, his spokesman said.
